title: ATypI'o8: Submission deadline extended
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408104035im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/AA%2050%20Small_4929.png)
Attention all who were thinking of giving a talk at the forthcoming [_conference of ATypI in St.Petersburg_](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408104035/http:/typophile.com/node/43109). The ATypI’o8 Programme Committee has just decided to extend the deadline for submission of proposals to **Monday, 14 April**.
 [‹ Interview with typographers needed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408104035/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43389 "Go to previous forum topic") [Price of fonts... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408104035/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43431 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Maxim Zhukov

comments.content: That’s a relief, a few more days to refine my “Bullies, baddies and bastards” talk proposal!

Who’s the designer (logo)?
Pyotr Alexeyevich Romanov, a.k.a. Peter the Great
.

\> Pyotr Alexeyevich Romanov

Nice. He wasn’t too busy? I hope he isn’t going to miss the _dead_ line :^)
